00033     class InferenceNetworkBuilder : public indri::lang::Walker {

00037       indri::collection::Repository& _repository;

00039       int _resultsRequested;
00040       int _maxWildcardTerms;
00041 
00042       template<typename _To, typename _From>
00043       std::vector<_To*> _translate( const std::vector<_From*>& children ) {
00044         std::vector<_To*> translation;
00045 
00046         for( unsigned int i=0; i<children.size(); i++ ) {
00047           translation.push_back( dynamic_cast<_To*>(_nodeMap[children[i]]) );  
00048         }
00049 
00050         return translation;
00051       }
00052 
00053       indri::query::TermScoreFunction* _buildTermScoreFunction( const std::string& smoothing, double occurrences, double contextSize, int documentOccurrences, int documentCount ) const;

00061       void _after( indri::lang::ExtentParent* extentInside );
